scripts.start: cross-env PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 concurrently "node src/run-pelican.js --verbose" "npm run watch-styles" "npm run watch-templates" "npm run serve"
scripts.watch-styles: nodemon --watch theme --ext js,scss,css --ignore theme/static/dist/* --exec "node src/update-theme.js styles" --verbose
scripts.watch-templates: nodemon --watch pelican/content --watch theme --ext html,md --ignore theme/static/dist/* --exec "node src/update-theme.js templates" --verbose
scripts.serve: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:8000 && cross-env browser-sync start --proxy http://127.0.0.1:8000 --files "pelican/output/**/*.*" --verbose
